text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet. Isn’t that cool?
They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
Let’s give a V V very warm welcome to the V V very sweet Miss V.
Hello, how are you?
We are going to learn something new.
But it’s all going to be okay
V V V is all you have to say.
A V V V V vase a lovely white vase
To keep your flowers standing tall In their place
V V V vegetable, green leafy vegetable
I eat everyday sitting in my table
A V V V V van a bright and shiny van
It has letters and parcels driven by the postman
A V V V V vest a white knitted vest
Wear it in the winter to warm your chest.
A V V violin a lovely wooden violin
I hold it with my left hand and under my chin.
V V V volleyball a game of volleyball
We all love to play more fun than going to the mall.
A V V V V viper a big and slithery viper
He can hide in the trees cause he’s quite a climber.
V V V V vowels special five are the vowels
A E I O U are the wow five vowels
V V V very nice miss V is really very wise.
So much we did today learn judges, now its your turn.
Very nice!
Vibrant!
Versatile!
Valuable!
Thank you Miss V, and our very smart Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
